dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2436 IH: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to reauthorize the organic agriculture research and extension initiative.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Pingree (for herself, Mr. Newhouse, and Mr. Panetta) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 to reauthorize the organic agriculture research and extension initiative.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the “Organic Agriculture Research Act of 2017”.

section.header: Organic agriculture research and extension initiative reauthorized
section.text: Section 1672B(e) of the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990 (7 U.S.C. 5925b(e)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking 2012 and inserting 2018; and
by amending subparagraph (C) to read as follows:

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking 2018 and inserting 2023.
